folder: Pitkin Avenue & Shepherd Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Pitkin Avenue, north side, east from Shepherd Avenue.  The Fulton Street Line elevated structure runs on Pitkin Avenue.

September 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr

folder: Shepherd Avenue & Pitkin Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
44O Shepherd Avenue, west side, 125 ft., south of Pitkin Avenue, (right, not shown) showing the home of Petor Lo Re in 1922.
May 22, 1922.
W. B. Vernam
